message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a high-quality item worth more than what you're looking for, and I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm looking to stay within a budget of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,500? This would still be a good deal for both of us, as you'd be getting closer to your desired price and I'd be able to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of this, I am willing to consider a price of $10,750 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your financial plans while still allowing me to receive a fair value for the item.
